data.name: Children of Zodiarcs Collector's Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
Children of Zodiarcs – Out Now For MacOS


About the Game

Children of Zodiarcs: Collector's Upgrade includes the game's full digital soundtrack, alongside a PDF artbook containing imagery from throughout the game's development process.

Soundtrack Listing:
Track 01 - Main Title [3m29]
Track 02 - Prologue [2m38]
Track 03 - Zirchhoff's Theme [4m02]
Track 04 - Ebony Flame [3m13]
Track 05 - Pester's Theme [2m03]
Track 06 - Party Management [3m32]
Track 07 - Argon's Theme [6m03]
Track 08 - Unstoppable Force [3m01]
Track 09 - Brice's Theme [1m44]
Track 10 - Cornered and Outnumbered [3m33]
Track 11 - Might of the Torans [2m42]
Track 12 - The Family [3m19]
Track 13 - Exiles [3m36]
Track 14 - Cannibalism [2m08]
Track 15 - Around the Campfire [1m49]
Track 16 - Black Fang Turf [3m06]
Track 17 - Clan Domination [3m20]
Track 18 - Zodiarc Relic [0m34]
Track 19 - Xero's Theme [3m08]
Track 20 - To War My Children [2m47]
Track 21 - A Mysterious Trial [1m17]
Track 22 - In the Depths of Consciousness [3m46]
Track 23 - Facing the Ghosts [2m00]
Track 24 - Learning the Hard Way [0m43]
Track 25 - World Map [2m16]
Track 26 - Battle Plans [1m22]
Track 27 - Kingdog's Theme [6m19]
Track 28 - Nahmi's Theme [4m45]
Track 29 - Betrayal [2m48]
Track 30 - Cruel Hand of Fate [3m55]
Track 31 - Under the Shell [1m55]
Track 32 - Another Candle for the Lost [5m35]
Track 33 - Friends Against Friends [2m38]
Track 34 - End of a King [4m00]
Track 35 - Credits (Xero's Theme Alternate Version) [3m08]

data.short_description: Children of Zodiarcs: Collector's Upgrade includes the game's full digital soundtrack, alongside a PDF artbook containing imagery from throughout the game's development process.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32-bit or above)
  • Processor: Pentium G4400 /AMD Phenom II X2-550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 /AMD HD R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6300 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 1GB /AMD HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite version 10.10.5
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256 MB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
